attributes.action: Creation of single-portal import and export guide for non-EU countries
attributes.additional_details: As the United Kingdom prepares to exit the EU, it is vital that a single-portal guide is developed for non-EU countries which would enable small business to easily understand the import and export procedures, classified by products, associated regulations, correct point of contact, including the customs tariff. Currently this information is fragmented across the GOV UK website. This portal would act as a trade booster for the UK, for the country to trade with our neighbors and the world
attributes.background: Currently the procedures for importing and exporting products are deeply fragmented, with the information highly confusing, this is affecting small businesses who wish to export and import from the UK. I would ask the Government to create an easy-to-understand portal for easier trade facilitation

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Dominic Grieve QC MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Beaconsfield
